_meanings:
{@--2@} ({%a%}) 
Taking, having. ({%b%}) Receiving, recovering.
({%c%}) Containing or being in possession
of anything or consecrating.

{@--6@} ({%a%})
Engendering, producing,  
{#kOtukADAnahetoH#} <ls>Me. 3</ls>; {#garBADAnakzaRapArecayAt#} <ls n="Me.">9.</ls>
({%b%}) Assigning, attributing, 
employing.

{@--9@} A place
where anything is deposited, a 
receptacle, as in {#pakvADAnaM, puruzADAnaM#}.

{@--12@} A
ceremony performed previous to
conception; see {#garBADAna#}.
